pages.name: Ender Toxin I
pages.text: Allows damaging ender-based creatures like Endermen by augmenting the projectiles themselves. It also prevents Endermen and Shulkers from teleporting away when hit.

pages.name: Ender Toxin II
pages.text: The turret will be able to damage huge ender-based creatures like the Ender Dragon due to further projectile augmentation.$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Ender Toxin I to be installed.$()
